PAD_Ritual.synopsis: The party finds a text in Ketheric’s chamber that hints at his connection to Myrkul and his ‘apostle’ form. A successful religion check references death or divinity - not explicitly calling out Myrkul by name.

PAD_Ritual_0.text: Ketheric's been studying something called the Apostle... but of which god?
